name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a pan, cook bacon. Mix eggs with parmesan, add to pasta, and stir quickly. Serve with black pepper.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, eggs, and milk. Heat a pan, cook pancakes. Serve with butter and sugar.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk. Cook in a pan. Add cheese, onion, and pepper. Serve hot.

name: Spiderweb Cheesecake
instructions: Mix and prepare cheesecake, then pipe chocolate web on top.

name: Spider Cookies (No-Bake)
instructions: Boil sugar, cocoa, butter, and milk. Add peanut butter and vanilla. Mix in oatmeal and drop onto wax paper.

name: PB Marshmallow Bars
instructions: Melt butter, peanut butter, and butterscotch chips over low heat. Cool slightly before adding marshmallows. Spread into a pan and chill.

name: No-Bake Cherry Cheesecake
instructions: Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Spread into crust and top with cherry pie filling. Chill before serving.

name: Vanilla Apple Crisp with Caramel Sauce
instructions: Toss apples with sugar, vanilla, lemon juice, and nutmeg. Mix flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and butter. Bake at 350°F for 35–45 minutes.

name: Banana Loaf
instructions: Cream butter, sugar, and eggs. Mix in bananas, then dry ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 1 hour.

name: Caramel Popcorn Balls
instructions: Heat brown sugar in boiling water until dissolved. Stir in butter. Pour over popcorn and shape into balls.

name: Cinnamon Rolls
instructions: Mix dry ingredients to form dough. Roll out and spread butter, sugar, and cinnamon. Bake at 425°F for 14-16 minutes.

name: PB Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients together. Roll into balls and flatten. Bake at 325°F for 20 minutes.

name: Easy Cheesecake Fudge Brownies
instructions: Prepare brownie mix as directed. Mix cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, and egg. Pour cheesecake mixture over brownie batter and swirl. Bake at 375°F.

name: Chicken Balls
instructions: Boil chicken, let cool, then cut into chunks. Dip in pancake mix, then deep-fry in peanut oil.

name: Roseanne's Meatballs
instructions: Mix ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 1 hour.

name: Nana's Chicken
instructions: Dip chicken pieces in egg/milk mixture, then flour/breadcrumbs. Shake and cook.

name: Chocolate Chunk Cookies
instructions: Cream margarine and sugars. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Add dry ingredients. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Drop onto cookie sheet and bake at 350°F.

name: Bubbly Bake
instructions: Mix all ingredients and place in a baking dish. Bake at 375°F for 40 minutes.

name: Chicken Balls (Deep-Fried)
instructions: Boil chicken for 5 minutes, let cool. Cut into chunks, coat in pancake mix, then deep-fry.

name: Michelle's Meatballs
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shape into balls, and bake at 350°F.
